byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Hwaida Saad from Beirut; Maher Samaan from Paris; an employee of The New York Times from Damascus; and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Syrian capital and its vicinity have been afflicted by the loss of water for weeks, leaving taps dry and creating long lines at wells.
snippet: The Syrian capital and its vicinity have been afflicted by the loss of water for weeks, leaving taps dry and creating long lines at wells....

headline.main: A New Casualty of Syria’s War: Drinking Water in Damascus
headline.print_headline: Another Casualty of the Syrian War: Drinking Water in Damascus
